Key Match Events: Houston's 32-12 run to end the first half and start the second half.
Houston made 18 of 23 free throws compared to just 8 of 16 by Dallas.
Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks led by four midway through the second quarter before Houston used a 21-8 run to take a 61-52 lead into halftime.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets snapped a 2-game skid with the win.
The Mavericks lost for the third time in four games playing without Luka Doncic, who strained his calf on Christmas Day.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Amen Thompson served the first of a two-game suspension for a fight with Miami's Tyler Herro Sunday night.
Both teams are back in action Friday night.
Others: Luka Doncic will be out at least a month due to a strained calf.
Naji Marshall remained out serving a four-game suspension for his role in a fight against the Suns.
